Name: NMR Spectroscopy: Basic Principles, Concepts and Applications in Chemistry

ReviewList.Text: Even though it's a good introduction to NMR spectroscopy, maybe some readers (as for me that I'm an undergraduate) can see a little bit difficult, and of course, some help to understand this topic may be required. Nevertheless, it's a great book for those who are searching for a reference text (from my point of view).
